summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein requesting to meet with Paul Morris and his associates. The email emphasizes confidentiality and includes a disclaimer about the privileged nature of the communication.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, requesting a meeting with Paul Morris and his associates.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is mentioned as someone Epstein wishes to meet with, along with his associates.

connections.description: Epstein is seeking to meet with Morris and his associates, indicating a social or professional connection.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is requesting to meet with Paul Morris and his associates.
The email contains a confidentiality disclaimer indicating it may be attorney-client privileged.
The communication is marked as confidential and unauthorized use is prohibited.
